boardgame.name: Attika
Η Μάχη των Πολιτισμών
boardgame.description: In ancient Greece _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; the cradle of European culture _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Athens, Sparta, Corinth, and Thebes compete for dominance of the Greek peninsula and influence over the shrines. Each player oversees the building of their own city-state. Temple, theater and oracle, a harbor with ships, vineyard with vintner, and many more must find space on the Greek peninsula._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Attika, players must move fast to get the best land for themselves while blocking their opponents from good building spots. As building is expensive, players seek to save money by using the natural resources of the peninsula. Players also seek to organize their building in an order that allows building for free. The game is won by the first player to connect two shrines or to construct all 30 of their buildings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2004 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
2004 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Advanced Game Nominee

never played +++++ german version, but game parts are language independent and you can find rules translations here on boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia and australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : direct bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) or cash (by letter) +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped or what´s it´s weight), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. MINOR WEAR ON THE BOX, GERMAN HIG EDITION DISCOUNT RULES: IF YOU BUY 3 OR MORE GAMES YOU´LL GET DISCOUNT. THE PERCENTAGE IS (DAY+MONTH)/2 (Example: If you buy the games on 12th June you´ll get 12+6=18/2=9 %). So you can get a max. Discount on 31th december of 21 % :_). The date is the BGG-TIME (CST). The only reason i didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t give my copy a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rating is for some slight wear along one of the corners and on the back of the box. Other than that, this game is in top notch shape--maybe only played 5-6 times. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a great light-medium game that can be played during a lunch hour with just enough city building and resource gathering to scratch that gaming itch. Attika is also out of print, and of this writing, listed on ebay for $60. I just need to make some space on my game shelf and a little money in my pocket. I want to find it a good home!

All our games are brand new, some might have their shrink removed to show it to our customers. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases, this will save you money. Shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Spellekijn is a brick _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; mortar shop located in Leeuwarden, The Netherlands – we are not someone_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s garage or basement. We offer free open gaming and events to the public at the store and have over 3400 titles in stock (we do not list them all on BGG). You can find them all on our website. You are also free to contact us. International Customers, please ask for your precise shipping costs. Methods of payment: • You can always pick the game up in our local shop :-) • You can make a bank transfer free of charge to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC if your bank account is nominated in EURO. • You can use paypal Euro paypal. (That should be the first choice for non-EU customers) Check our website: www.spellekijn.nl prices may be different on our website due to special BGG offers.
